mapper.sql: id, member_id, name, other_remarks, status, invite_code_pic, invite_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, (select nick from bu_member_info b where b.id = a.member_id) as nick, (select count(id) from bu_shopowner b where b.salesman_id = a.member_id and b.del_flag='0') as shopowner_count, (select STAFF_NAME from sys_staff_info b where b.STAFF_ID = a.create_by) as create_name
mapper.insert:
